entity.name: The White House

text: @realDonaldTrump Ivanka Trump assistant tests positive for coronavirus, among other White House staff. If this is true that would be number 3? Getting closer to the 15 you talked about in the beginning, cause I guess you didnt mean 15 in the US but 15 in your administration right??
